objects.text: Spacious Design | Gold Accents | Premium Faux Leather

product_details.description: ALDO womens Durable handbag This spaciously stylish tote bag boasts ample storage space and shoulder strap for extra utility Made of synthetic materials 1 compartment: stylish and functional to store your cell phone, wallet, or any other essential you need near by Medium: the perfect medium sized handbag for everyday life Size: 10.9'' L x 4'' W x 12.4'' H (28cm x 10.5cm x 32cm) Fabric type - Faux Leather ** Origin - Imported ** Closure type - Zipper ** Lining - Synthetic ** Country of Origin - Cambodia **

banner_details:
The banner features a luxurious and elegant presentation of a fashion accessory. At the center, a realistically rendered image of a taupe-colored tote bag ("product_image") is the focal point, framed by soft concentric circles hinting at warmth and sophistication. Above it, a refined serif-style headline ("heading") conveys the brand and product title in deep coffee brown. Beneath it, a slim subheading ("subheading") and an understated tagline ("tagline") highlight everyday elegance in matching tones. Below the product, a description ("description") outlines key features, followed by a bold pricing detail ("price") in large type. A “SHOP NOW” call-to-action button ("cta") with white text sits against a warm brown rectangle ("cta_button").

**Color Palette:**
- Background Gradient: #e8d7c9 → #d4b599  
- Accent Gradient: #d4a978 → #c79266  
- Text Color (Headings/Descriptions): #6d4c36, #8d6e57, #5c3f2e  
- CTA Button: #9e7e63  
- CTA Text: #ffffff
product_color: The product image showcases a sophisticated handbag with a warm, medium camel brown base (#AD7E5C), which exudes elegance and versatility. The leather texture adds depth to the solid color, while the gold metallic hardware (#D4AF37) — including buckles, chain, charms, and branding — offers contrast, highlighting the luxury appeal. These gold accents are evenly distributed, drawing the eye strategically without overshadowing the bag’s earthy main tone. A hint of soft beige (#F5F5DC) may be used as a background to enhance the product's visibility. For an advertisement banner, a warm, neutral palette combining camel brown, gold, beige, and soft ivory (#FAF9F6) would reinforce the premium feel.
